metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31621 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: MariaDB Server before 10.7 is vulnerable to Denial of Service. In extra/mariabackup/ds_xbstream.cc, when an error occurs (stream_ctxt->dest_file == NULL) while executing the method xbstream_open, the held lock is not released correctly, which allows local users to trigger a denial of service due to the deadlock.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.6 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
